item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle Pillow-The Playfull Prince
item.description: "They say love is blind, but in your case I’m assuming it’s also deaf, dumb, and completely brain dead." -- Michelle Pillow-The Playfull Prince

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "Wait, I'm not done.. We didn't have a stuffed bear. And, since I'm not even sure what sort of beast a teddy bear is or where one would find it, I brought you a stuffed baldric instead. It will have to suffice." -Prince Quinn" -- Michelle M. Pillow

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "I would make a HORRIBLE outlaw. I can plan the crime perfectly, but I'd also need to plan the outcomes to make it work." -- Michelle M. Pillow

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "I wish life were a fiction novel. Then everyone would have to do what I say." -- Michelle M. Pillow

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "I think people need hope when times are tough. I think they also need escape and adventure and fantasy. Books are like cheap mini vacations." -- Michelle M. Pillow

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "Confession: I don't want to be one of my characters. I'm mean to them sometimes. Really mean." -- Michelle M. Pillow

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "My cat mocks me frequently. It's the universe's way of keeping me from getting too big of an ego." -- Michelle M. Pillow

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "The web is a dangerous place for a mind begging to slack off and be distracted by nonsense." -- Michelle M. Pillow

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "People should know better than to be an ass in front of writers. We immortalize things. Lots of things. And we take liberties with character descriptions." -- Michelle M. Pillow

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "Advice from a Romance Writer: Guys, make your woman feel pretty even on an 'off' day. Trust me, good things will come of it." -- Michelle M. Pillow

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "I heart my job. I get to make things up for a living." -- Michelle M. Pillow

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "Alek didn’t move, unsure what he could say or do to erase her pain. Like the rest of the Draig, he was a warrior, a fighter, used to the action of doing what needed to be done. But in this situation there was no giant fanged yorkin to hunt, no Var army to battle. There was only reality and the flawed nature of imperfect men. - Dragon Lords 6: The Stubborn Lord by Michelle M. Pillow - Coming 2013" -- Michelle M. Pillow

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "Chocolate is medicinal. I just did another study that confirms it." -- Michelle M. Pillow

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "A lie, when believed, became the truth." -- Michelle M. Pillow

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "Only a sentimental being would care about such everyday things—things used and discarded by the humans of their respective eras without thought, yet kept and preserved by an immortal who never forgot them. An immortal who loved and cared for them, dusting them off for an eternity, keeping their dead spirits as alive as he—stuck in their immortal tomb never to find the rest everything must eventually seek. Time had no meaning in this cavern of infinite age." -- Michelle M. Pillow

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "He had seen so much of life, but even more of death. He had seen countless eras come and go and still he braved forward, forever alone. And here she was ready to give up after a few lousy years. She was a coward." -- Michelle M. Pillow

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "This is not a white and black business we are in. There are messy shades of crimson haunting us in everything we do." -- Michelle M. Pillow

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "I confess... if I typo a Facebook post I will edit it. I know it's only Facebook but it's an editing sickness." -- Michelle M. Pillow

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "People who make snide comments to authors like "anyone can write a book" or "well, you did it, so obviously I can/it can't be that hard" or poke at a book because it's "romance" or "genre fiction" and act like that somehow makes it substandard because they don't read it... well, ok, go ahead. Write a bestseller. Don't forget to go through the correct edit process. We'll wait." -- Michelle M. Pillow

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "I love my career. It is a career. A difficult one that takes many hours and total dedication to my craft. It is also what I was born to do--tell stories and entertain." -- Michelle M. Pillow

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "For some reason, when people meet me and find out I'm a writer they always ask if I write children's books. Um... please don't let your kids read my books. Well, unless your kids are in their 30s or something...then yeah, they're old enough. LOL" -- Michelle M. Pillow

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "Life is too short to dwell in the negativity all the time." -- Michelle M. Pillow

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "When people get into their 30s plus "boyfriend" sounds weird...if you really think about it. Instead, I think we should universally start using the term "manfriend" or "snookie bookie cuddles pie"." -- Michelle M. Pillow

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "If the weight comes from bacon you can so deduct it off the scale total to get your true weight. #science" -- Michelle M. Pillow

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "Out of all the things I do, I think being a mom is the most important and satisfying." -- Michelle M. Pillow

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "I'm like a stray cat. If you feed me, I don't leave." -- Michelle M. Pillow

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "He knew for certain that she belonged forever in his arms, just as he knew she didn’t realize it yet." -- Michelle M. Pillow

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "Sometimes, they just make coffee cups too small." -- Michelle M. Pillow

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "Without love, life was nothing but endless tasks and battles." -- Michelle M. Pillow

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Michelle M. Pillow
item.description: "What good was living if a man didn’t have a family?" -- Michelle M. Pillow
